actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to ensure the ability of public safety officers to retain their right to free speech on matters related to public safety, working conditions, and other matters.
